attributes.action: Make all sport & fitness safety equipment VAT exempt
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the government to make all sport & fitness safety equipment VAT exempt.

This will help reduce the cost of safely taking part in sport & physical activity.

Safety equipment includes but is not limited to: boxing gloves, boxing head gear, gum protectors, martial arts gloves, martial arts shin & foot protectors, body protectors, chest guards, groin guards, head/face protectors, safety mats, crash mats, football shin pads, goal keeper gloves, equestrian helmets, motor sport helmets & gloves, Bike gloves, knee & elbow protectors, Swimming floats, Safety glasses,
